item.description:
Well first of all this is a great location, with great food, great bars, great views and apparently they are going to be blasting off FIREWORKS too!!!! Al fresco dining at the sunset bar & grill, live music from 5pm on and the show at dusk ( 8:45/9pm)

they do have a rain date of JULY 1st, however we will all be over at the rooftop patio of Bespoke in downtown NEW HAVEN for JULY 1

So grab a friend and come have a drink or an appetizer or sit down for dinner at Waters Edge resort in WESTBROOK ansd then sit back and Ooooohhhh and AAAaaaHHHHhhhh with the crowd . .

glennn
item.how_to_find_us: go to outdoor bar or ask hostess

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Water's Edge Fireworks
